text: Ano kabe wa machi no 2-ri no osananai minashigo no mono de, sono-ka ni wa, kare-ra ni kizoku suru zaiho ga umete ari, chichioya wa tadashi jinbutsudeatta. Sorede omo wa, kare-ra ga seinen ni tasshite kara, sono zaiho o kare-ra ryonin no tame ni horidasu koto o nozoma reta. (Koreha)-nushi kara no onmegumidearu. Watashi ga katte ni itta kotode wa nakatta noda. Kore ga anata no tae rarenakatta koto no setsumeidearu
